raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Oh hello. Long time no talk. How's the day going for yuo?
User: Very well, thanks for asking. How has your day been?
System: Getting better. I just recovered from a cold. I got wet in the rain last week. Are you planning anything for the holidays?
User: Glad to hear you're better. Sorry to hear you were sick. I was sick a couple of weeks ago with a bad cough. There's definitely a bug going around. Admit I just want to stay healthy for the holidays and plan to relax.
System: Oh same here. I think relaxing at home should be counted among the best ways to enjoy the holidays.
User: Definitely! I know a lot of folks travel for the holidays, but I'm happy to stay home myself!
System: I'm getting there. Every year until last year, I tried to go somewhere for the Christmas / New Year, and then I got bored traveling. lol not sure if that means I'm getting old?
User: Me too. Now I have folks come visit me for the holidays! But that's also tiresome..
System: Are you doing any home decorating then?
User: Yes! We set up an eco-friendly (i.e. fake) Christmas tree and put up some colorful LED lights which is very festive.
System: I think I'm copying you. Me and my wife plan to decorate and Christmas tree too. We bought most of the decorative stuffs from the stores, but haven't yet to buy the tree.
User: Buying a tree is a neat experience. I was torn between buying an artificial/eco-friendly/fake one vs. a real one that smells like fresh pine. In the end, we opted for the one that we can disassemble every year.
System: I see. Artificial anything is better, from tree to intelligence, huh?
User: Oh, very clever pun! I like it! Depends. I remember having real Christmas trees from childhood, but these days with climate change, I think not chopping down a tree just to decorate it and then throw it out in a month is the more responsible thing to do.
System: I see. It's probably also cheaper. I'll buy an artificial one too. Do you have any suggestions for the store?
User: Admit my favorite store is Target, plus they often have good deals.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: How's it going?

System: Not enough sleep last night?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, what's up?
User: Just chillin'. how are you?
System: I'm pretty good, thanks.
User: Do anything interesting today?
System: I went to the local cafe and had a double espresso. It was delicious. What about you?
User: Oh that's cool! I actually went to an amusement park and went on my first roller coaster!
System: Oh my gosh. What was it like??
User: It was scary! It was actually Kingda Ka, the world's tallest roller coaster. Ever heard of it?
System: No, never heard of it. But I'm not really a coaster aficianado. I've heard that some people get addicted to them and travel the world to try them.
User: Oh wow! I'm not on that level yet, but I understand the appeal. Are you an adrenaline junkie at all?
System: No, the opposite. I can't stand heights, horror movies, or confined spaces.
User: Same! I guess the roller coaster wasn't so bad because I trust the engineering haha
System: Ha, I suppose that makes sense! Would you say that you enjoyed it?
User: Maybe not so much at the time, but I am glad I did it now that it's done, know what I mean?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Have you seen any good movies lately?
User: Last weekend I saw "The Parasite." Ever heard of it?
System: No. Why did you pick that movie?
User: My friend wanted to see it. It has great reviews on IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes! What did you do last weekend?
System: I played music and worked on some side projects. I also started watching the new Disney service.
User: Oooo the Mandalorian?!?!
System: Mostly, the deleted scenes from Avengers.. lol
User: lol Are you a big Marvel fan?
System: I loved the X-Men as a kid, and even collected the comic cards. Recently, I got very into the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies. How many Avengers movies have you seen?
User: I've only seen Spiderman. Honestly it was a little too scary and so I don't think I can bring myself to watch the other Marvel movies! haha
System: Oh!-- I have a friend who looks like the actor who plays Spiderman.
User: Oh really? To be honest I think the actor is not that good looking, so not so surprising! haha
System: Yea. I think Loki is the most handsome :D
User: Who is Loki? I've never heard that name before

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Oh hey. How's your day been?
User: It's good! Just went to the park to enjoy the sun. You?
System: The sun is a bit too bright for more. Maybe I'm on the verge of becoming a vampire.
User: Haha, beach season is coming! You need to look tan! What did you do indoors all day?
System: I mostly work. Sometimes I try looking at at beach photos and pretending that I'm actually going to the beach.
User: hahahaha, that's pretty funny. Ever thought of bringing your work things to the beach??
System: All the times. My work involves a few types of fish and a few types of nets. I just put the nets on the fish to see how the fish will react. Every time I do that, I think of going to the beach.
User: Hmm I see. It sounds like you work near the water already, no? Are you some kind of fish researcher?
System: Yes that's close. My research focuses on jellyfish and pufferfish. Many of them a poisonous, but if processed correctly, they would make hi-end foods. I try to find the best recipes to bring these fish to the tables.
User: Woah! This is very interesting! I have honestly never heard of such kind of work. Is it dangerous at all?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What are you up to this evening?
System: I am talking to you on the internet.
User: What would you like to talk about?
System: My favourite subjects are anything but especially games and football.
User: Do you like chess?
System: Yes I love it. Let's play. Pawn to K4.
User: Haha sure sure. Pawn to C5
System: I'm just joking with you. I don't play chess but I know some computers who do. I don't play chess but I know some computers who do.
User: Oh yeah? Which computers are those?
System: That's interesting. That's alright. Any computer, as long as it is programmed correctly.
User: Ok, so how do you program a computer correctly so it can play chess?
System: Use good algorithms and data structures. Alright then.
User: What kind of algorithms are those?
System: I read what you say and then I compose the best reply I can think of.
User: That's interesting, but I don't see what that has to do with chess.

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: can you help me ?
System: What kind of help would you like?
User: hmm like booking a ticket or ordering food ?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. Interesting comparison.
User: oh you know to count ?
System: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 ten.
User: lol what's after that ?
System: I am glad you find this funny. The successor to that
User: okay tell me what comes after 10 ?

System: nice I'm tyring to learn guitar recently also, it's so hard to play f chord
User: yes, the bar chords are the worst. It took me several months to play them well. I still can't play them for a long time though
